description: Packed with lentils and vegies, and topped with cauliflower mash, this healthier shepherd's pie recipe is a great twist on the classic dish.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,May 2021,Mince,Healthier Easier,Quick & easy lunch,Autumn,Weeknight dinner,Budget,Beef
name: Healthier Shepherdâ€™s Pie With Cauliflower Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can no-added salt lentils, rinsed, drained
2 tbs chopped continental parsley leaves (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion, garlic and mince, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until onion has softened and mince has browned. Add paste, stirring to combine.

Stir in lentils, vegetable mix, tomatoes, gravy powder, sauce and cup water. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, for 7 minutes or until mixture thickens and vegetables are heated through.
Meanwhile, heat mash following packet instructions. Stir in cheese. Preheat grill on high.
Spoon beef mixture into a 6-cup capacity ovenproof dish. Top evenly with mash. Grill for 5 minutes or until golden. Scatter over parsley and serve with bread.
